root.title: saab-scania issu 150 mln dlr eurobond
root.body: saab-scania AB issu 150 mln dlr eurobond due april 2 1992 pay pct price 101-3/4 pct lead manag morgan guaranti ltd say the bond avail denomin 5,000 50,000 dlr list london payment date april 2 1992 fee compris pct sell concess 5/8 pct manag underwrit combin list london
